articles.content: Things turned ugly during a Syed Mushtaq Ali Trophy Elite Group D game between Saurashtra and Baroda, as Sheldon Jackson and Ambati Rayudu engaged in a heated fight on Wednesday. Jackson, playing for… [+1872 chars]

articles.title: Sixers name squad for season opening blockbuster - Sydney Sixers
articles.description: The Sydney Sixers will officially kick off Weber WBBL|08 tomorrow night, naming a 13-player squad ahead of the blockbuster Thursday night clash with the Brisbane Heat.
articles.content:
The Sydneysiders will officially open the WBBL summer against the Heat in Mackay, as they look to return to glory this season.
The two-time WBBL champions will be looking to add a third trophy to th… [+2029 chars]

articles.description: Chelsea put in an impressive performance on Tuesday evening as they came out 2-0 victors against a 10-man AC Milan side in the UEFA Champions League
articles.content:
